issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

this is related to autoreverse. see Base UI => Animation => 2D or 3D Transform

{html}

comments.body:
{html}

Unable to fix this until we can use the block animation methods exclusive to 4.0. The reason is because we need the appropriate callback to be used; otherwise, the wrong autoreverse transform may be applied (if there are multiple animations running at once, for example). In fact, this is an issue even now.

Even at that point we may not be able to fix this without implementing our own autoreverse.

{html}

Bug Scrub: Invalid. Test Case exists in KitchenSink
